#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    int a,b,c,d;
    double area1,area2;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>a>>b>>c>>d;
              area1 = a * b;
              area2 = c * d;
              
              if((int)(area1/area2)==(double)(area1/area2))
              cout<<"yes\n";
              else
              cout<<"no\n";
    }
}
